      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color DEBUGCOLOR
      The color of the rays of the FOV during debug mode.

    • direction

      private float direction
      The direction of the FOV. In LibGdx, 0 is up.

    • range

      private float range
      The range in radians of the FOV

      private float radius
      The length of the FOV.

  • Constructor Details

    • Vision

      public Vision(float radius, float direction, float range, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
      Creates an FOV
      Parameters:
      radius - the radius/length of the FOV
      direction - the direction the FOV points in radians
      range - the range in radians of the FOV
      color - the color of the FOV for drawing, will always be drawn translucent

    • Vision

      public Vision(float radius, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
      Creates a circular FOV
      Parameters:
      radius - the radius of the FOV
      color - the color of the FOV for drawing, will always be translucent

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 origin)
      Updates the FOV to the current Box2d world state
      Parameters:
      world - the world
      origin - the origin of the FOV in Box2d world coordinates

    • canSee

      public boolean canSee(Obstacle obstacle)
      Returns whether a given obstacle is in view. Call only after update is called.
      Parameters:
      obstacle - the obstacle being checked
      Returns:
      whether the obstacle is in view.

    • setDirection

      public void setDirection(float direction)
      Modifies the direction of the FOV, maintains range Should be called when the parent obstacle turns around or flips, etc. Could also be used for robots that scan back and forth.
      Parameters:
      direction - the new direction in radians

    • draw

      public void draw(GameCanvas canvas, float x, float y, float scalex, float scaley)
      Draws the FOV, calls a helped method in GameCanvas.
      Parameters:
      canvas - Drawing context

    • drawDebug

      public void drawDebug(GameCanvas canvas, float x, float y, float scalex, float scaley)
      Draws the outline of the physics object.

    • setRange

      public void setRange(float range)

    • setRadius

      public void setRadius(float radius)
